titleStmt.title: The conclave of physicians in two parts, detecting their intrigues, frauds, and plots, against their patients, and their destroying the faculty of physick : also a peculiar discourse of the Jesuits bark, the history thereof, with its true use and abuse : moreover an account of some eminent cases and new principles in physick, of greater use than any yet known / by Gideon Harvey ...
titleStmt.author: Harvey, Gideon, 1640?-1700?

titleStmt.title: The conclave of physicians in two parts, detecting their intrigues, frauds, and plots, against their patients, and their destroying the faculty of physick : also a peculiar discourse of the Jesuits bark, the history thereof, with its true use and abuse : moreover an account of some eminent cases and new principles in physick, of greater use than any yet known / by Gideon Harvey ...
titleStmt.author: Harvey, Gideon, 1640?-1700?

editionStmt.edition: The second edition with many alterations.

notesStmt.note: Each part has special t.p.; the second, dated 1685, also has separate paging.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
